## GerstnerWaveGenerator.setWaveAmplitude() method

Sets the amplitude of the wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setWaveAmplitude(waveIndex: number, val: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |
|  val | number | Amplitude of the wave. |

**Returns:**

void
